page.title: 07TEENAGERS LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Nowadays most{teenagers}like to spend their{leisure }time at disco's, playing sports and going to town with friends and lots more. Most of these places are not around there own area.It really depends on how much {pocket money}they get. Teenagers have to go to the nearest {Town}or {City}. Teenagers mostly dont have to spend their time out, most of them spend their time indoors. Most of the { {teenagers}would like more {facilities} around their own area, so they dont have to spend alot of money on the busfare. Most boys and girls like going out to places together, eg. iceskating, pictures, swimming and town. Young teenagers like to spend their time mostly going to disco's with friends.
